text: Atahpara tini tadera malapatre ara karalena tamra bha'iyera malera age, tarapara tini ta bera karalena tamra bha'iyera malapatra theke. E'ibhabe'i amara i'usuphera jan'ya parikalpana karechilama. Tamra pakse rajara a'ina anusare tamra bha'ike rakha sambhaba chila na yadi na allah iccha karatena. Amara yake iccha kari stare stare unnata kari. Ara pratyeka jnanabanadera upare rayechena sarbajnanamaya.
